metadata.title: CVE-2019-17571 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Included in Log4j 1.2 is a SocketServer class that is vulnerable todeserialization of untrusted data which can be exploited to remotelyexecute arbitrary code when combined with a deserialization gadget whenlistening to untrusted network traffic for log data. This affects Log4jversions up to 1.2 up to 1.2.17.

criterions.comment: apache-log4j1.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
